about_the_game:
Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop – Map Extension DLC expands the ""Angel Shores” map of Bus Simulator 21 with a huge new area in the north. Players can look forward to a mountainous nature reserve with idyllic lakes, forests, and villages. It offers numerous new campaign missions, new bus stops, and a new feature in the form of wild animal crossings! So, be careful when driving through the impressive countryside!

The Map Expansion DLC is free for all owners of Bus Simulator 21 and Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop – Gold Edition. It’s part of the massive Next Stop update, which adds numerous improvements and a brand-new career mode to the game. It's also free for everyone who owns Bus Simulator 21 and the new Gold Edition.

Huge new area in the US “Angel Shores” map.

New missions.

New feature: wild animal crossings.
detailed_description:
Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop – Map Extension DLC expands the ""Angel Shores” map of Bus Simulator 21 with a huge new area in the north. Players can look forward to a mountainous nature reserve with idyllic lakes, forests, and villages. It offers numerous new campaign missions, new bus stops, and a new feature in the form of wild animal crossings! So, be careful when driving through the impressive countryside!

The Map Expansion DLC is free for all owners of Bus Simulator 21 and Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop – Gold Edition. It’s part of the massive Next Stop update, which adds numerous improvements and a brand-new career mode to the game. It's also free for everyone who owns Bus Simulator 21 and the new Gold Edition.

Huge new area in the US “Angel Shores” map.

New missions.

New feature: wild animal crossings.

name: Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop - Official Map Extension

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2120 / AMD Phenom II X4 830 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (2GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon R9 280 (2GB VRAM) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 / AMD FC-8140z or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 (8GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56 (8GB VRAM) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space

short_description: Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop – Map Extension DLC is free and extends the "Angel Shores" map with a huge new area. The mountainous nature reserve offers numerous new campaign missions, new stops, and more!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
